original_text: besides their male and female servants, of whom there were 7,337, and they had 200 male and female singers.
korean_text: 그 외에 남종과 여종이 칠천삼백삼십칠 명이요 노래하는 남녀가 이백 명이요

sentences.original_text: besides their male and female servants,
and they had 200 male and female singers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 200명의 남녀 가수를 두고 있었다.
